import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-todo-add', templateUrl: './todo-add.component.html', styleUrls: ['./todo-add.component.css'], }) export class TodoAddComponent implements OnInit { title: string | undefined; desc: string | undefined; ngOnInit(): void {} onSubmit(){ cnst } }
